name: Duet (itch)
description:
Duet is a Co-op puzzle-action platformer where you must trade and manage your game mechanics with a friend in order to complete the stage. 

Mechanics you'll be trading with a friend:

-Jump

-Run

-Voice (Comfort)

-Weapon (Sword)

-Levitate (psst, you can levitate your friend too!)

-Controllers are required for play-

Right Stick: Move your character.

Left Stick: Move levitated object.

A: Use selected mechanic.

Bumpers: Cycle through mechanics.

-Credits-

Programming: Jacob Beimers

(@JakeIsDev)

Art: Garrett Hoofman

(@ghoofman)

Made for Brackey's Game Jam #2, under the theme, "Love is blind."
